entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near midnight. Snow level 1400 metres. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers. Snow level 1400 metres rising to 1700 metres in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Snow level 1700 metres. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 6 April 2023
